rows.label: tlk000901_09_msg0001
rows.name:
To reach Eden, we must first
stop Serpent, the beast that carved
the Great Void.

rows.label: tlk000901_09_msg0002
rows.name:
And Serpent's directive was issued
from Luxuria, Zeke's homeland...

rows.label: tlk000901_09_msg0003
rows.name:
I've prepared envoy documents
for you so that you may enter as
representatives of Acedia.

rows.label: tlk000901_09_msg0004
rows.name:
I entreat you to reach Eden before
Metsu. Do it as a favor for a once-
foolish old man.
